The Guizhou Zhijin Yanjiao Coal Mine is a shaft coal mine located in the Bijie region of Guizhou Province

operators: 贵州众一金彩黔矿业有限公司
owners: Guizhou Panjiang Refined Coal Co. Ltd.
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Guizhou Zhijin Yanjiao Coal Mine, which is a subsidiary of Guizhou Panjiang Refined Coal Co. Ltd., part of the state-owned Guizhou Energy Group.
